column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " You 've got something I want . "
#Text=Sokka says : " That thing sees with its nose .
#Text=" Iroh says : " June !
#Text=No !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle ?
#Text=I did n't see you get hit with the tongue .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Shhh .
#Text=" Aang says : " So ... where do we go ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We 're getting you to the North Pole .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , we 've lost too much time as it is .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't you want to see your father ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Of course we do , Aang .
#Text=But , you 're our family , too .
#Text=And right now , you need us more .
#Text=" Katara says : " And we need you .
#Text=" Aang says : " I wish I could give you a little piece of home , Katara .
#Text=Something to remind you ... " Katara says : " I 'll be okay .
#Text=" Aang says : " Still , just a little trinket .
#Text=Maybe something like ... this ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , how 'd you get that ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Zuko asked me to be sure I got it to you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aw , that 's so sweet of Zuko .
#Text=Could you give him a kiss for me when you see him ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Sure .
#Text="
